definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: We offer fully refined oil for cosmetic application which is pale yellow in colour and is almost odourless .

sentences.english: Then perhaps you may have some more filberts some other time.
sentences.chinese: 或许，你下一次能拿到更多的榛子呢。

sentences.english: Add in coconut shreds and hazelnut powder.

sentences.english: Fresh butter and fresh hazelnuts have certain similarities.
sentences.chinese: 新鲜的黄油和新鲜的榛子有某种程度的类似。

sentences.english: When I was a little boy, my brother and I used to make bows out of hazelnut branches.
sentences.chinese: 当我还是个小男孩时，常和弟弟用榛子树枝做弓。
清新的坚果，榛子，皮香，青气。

sentences.english: I have handled Uranium the size of a hazelnut.

sentences.english: The root biomass on half sunny slope was obviously smaller than that of half shady slope.
sentences.chinese: 半阳坡虎榛子根系较半阴坡的生物童明显减少。

sentences.english: When filled with hazelnut pastry cream, they are a real treat.
sentences.chinese: 当充满榛子酥皮奶油，他们是真正的治疗。

sentences.english: Hazelnuts are rich in minerals and folic acid.
sentences.chinese: 榛子富含矿物质和叶酸。

sentences.english: Let me guess, Grandmother. You're hazelnut.
sentences.chinese: 让我猜猜，奶奶，那您就是榛子口味的。

sentences.english: As a result, the price of their hazelnuts last year was the best it has ever been.
sentences.chinese: 其结果是，去年他们榛子的价格是历年最高的。

sentences.english: Spice-based flavored coffee can either be cinnamon hazelnut or cinnamon almond praline.

sentences.english: and sawdust and filbert husks to make red wine more astringent.
sentences.chinese: 锯末和榛子壳使红酒口感更加涩。

sentences.english: Roast the hazelnuts in the oven until brown.
sentences.chinese: 把榛子放到烤箱里烤至焦黄。
